content.detailedDescription: I was going south bound on medical center drive in san bernardino, ca on my wayto band rehearsal when i noticed to off to my left a shiny metallic object.The irony leading to this event is that i had spent two years studding thissubject do to the reason that i had very memorable experience at the age oftwelve which would fall under the category of an encounter of the second kind.Anyway, as an added note, this was an extremely clear day, i mean you could readthe licenses  off an airplane if you know what i mean. honestly, i had beenpreparing myself for this so i was pretty calculated in recording the event.It was 402 p. m on february 1998, i observed a shiny metallic craft proceedingin a ne direction, from which time i had pulled into the middle turning lane inorder to track the craft more accurately. almost immediately after this time thecraft became obscured in the trees, so i turned east in order not to lose sitethe craft. i came to the end of the street to find the craft had made a rightangle turn and headed back in a southern direction and it had slowed down andstarted to just putt around.This lasted to 404 and 50 seconds and then it went up at a 35 degree angle anddisappeared. the craft was oval shaped with a red beacon type light on top. themost amusing part of this sighting was thiswas one the most clearest days i canremember and there was plenty of people outside walking around but no one waslooking up, and this thing was only about a 800 to 1000 feet up...Amazing
content.summary: My 1998 ufo observation

content.detailedDescription: We were returning home from being at a friends house.  we pulled into the driveway at home and looked into the sky.  above us was a triangular shaped craftmoving slowly in a north - east direction.  it occurred at 1130p.M. i looked atmy watch to confirm the time.  this is the first time i have observed such anevent. the craft had lights along its delta wing shape, they were white incolour.  i would guess its speed at about 200 to 300 miles an hour.
content.summary: Observed triangle shaped craft travel north east

content.detailedDescription: bob and i were driving in my car home to babbitt,after working in ely-going slightly southwest on hwy.21,a wooded road with alot of wildlife to be on the watch for..It was about 904 pm,the sun was still very well up and it was bright-i happened to glance up over the treeline,as i often do,and to the east-northeast saw what appeared at first to be a large jet airliner.What caught my attention was its size,shape,and colorbrightness.It was a flattened rectangle,like a cigar box viewed from the side,and very bright and reflective,not at all the dull aluminum tone of a plane.It was much too large to be a small plane,and it was hovering in place.We both were struck by the reflective nature of the craft,and its flight path-watched it for several minutes and slowed our own progress down alot on the road in order to get a betttter look-i was sayingdo you think we are seeing a ufo here,or is this something explainable we felt curious,but calm,not frightened.Tried to disceern if it was an old bi-plane,because of that rectangular appearance-but this thing was large,and truly hovering.Just when i told bob to pull over so i could find my binoculars beneath the front seat,the thing shot off and out of view,toward the ne,gone in an instant-we both mentioned the feeling that it somehowknewwe were trying to get a closer look,because of how it dissapeared immediately upon my reaching for binoculars.It was gone,and we drove the rest of the way homeits a 14 mile trip from ely to babbitt-this happened about 8 mi.Out of elyfeeling calm and even tired,didnt talk much.My 18 yr old daughter then reported seeing something very similar several days later,to me,which made me wonder all the more just what was this bright,reflective and hovering object-from what we could tell it must have easily been about the size of two 747s laid end to end.
content.summary: A bright,platinum-colored rectangular object.

content.detailedDescription: I had just stopped my car, and i took off my seat belt and looked up in thenight sky.  it was a clear night and the stars seemed so bright.  so i continuedto look at them.  then i saw something moving, like a satelite.  i figured itwas a satelite, but it was accompanied by two other lights.  i thought it wastwo satelites following another, but then it turned. i know that satelitestravel in straight, so to speak paths.  i was traveling farely slow.  the lightslooked exactly like satelites, but they were to prefectly spaced and turningunlike a satelite.  i would say it was as big as a penny at arms lenghth.  itheaded south then turned to south east.  it started to disappear after it gotaways se.  the tip of  the triangle disappeared first, then the back two.
content.summary: Saw large triangle

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside.It was hoivering in the sky.A space ship.Amazement.Round,seemed to change some shape and color...Appeared 2 days in a row.Flew off at dawn.
content.summary: Have video, round electrical form

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside house around 230 am on clear night and immdiately noticedflashing lights - obviously not a plane as it was basicly not moving. looked atobject through binoculars and saw closeup of strange pulsating lightenergy soucethat occassionally changed colors. observed object off and on for close tohalf-hour. object began jumping around crazily and eventually moved out of sightover western sillouete of nearby mountain. my first sighting.
content.summary: Flashing colored lights over chocorua

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling south on hwy 522 just north of the new mexicocolorado border.The wild mustangs caught our attention, and we decided to pull over and snap apicture. when we got home we were reviewing our pictures from our trip when wenoticed an ufo in the picture. we all got very excited about it. i feel it is aspace craft not of this earth. i would like it analyzed to maybe determine whatthe atomic nature of it is.
content.summary: We were not the only life forms watching the musta

content.detailedDescription: Woke up paralyzed in bd.Rm.Being next to highboy pointed silver rodat me,startedto be able to move a bit. being smiled at mealso blue white light outside bd.Rm.Window being disappearedwlight all very fast woke up partner was sofrightened.Said he never saw me so upsetover my life other things happened
content.summary: Someone in my bedroom

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving from tulsa to oklahoma city.  we were near tinkerair force base.  some time in the mid mnorningim really not sure of the time buti know it was during day light.  we saw some planes chasing another  thing thatkinda looked like a plane.  the only difference was that it see4med to beshooting lights like sparklers out the rear of the ufo.  we thought at firstthat what ever it was was going to crash but suddenly to shot up in the sky onabout a 45 degree angel.  the other planes tried to follow up but it moved veryvery quickly.Up into the air...Honestly i dont know what we saw but it wassomething very strange....I have never before seen anything like this..I spent 5years in the air force and i have never seen a plane do that and i have neverseen a plane move so fast...Im not a quack  im a rn and my daughter is in themilitary and repares planes and helacopters
content.summary: Strange sightings by tinker afb

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep on my couch and woke up.  i looked out the window in my dining roomand saw a bright light in the distance.  at first i thought it was a star butthen it appeared to be moving from side to side slightly and it was growingbigger.  i then noticed some lights flashing to the sides of the brighter, whitelight.  i figured it was just an airplane but the pattern was strange so got upfrom the couch and went to the door leading to our deck.  i noticed the objectgetting much closer and it appeared to be very low to the ground.  i turned offthe back porch light and stepped out onto the deck just in time to see it passover, i noticed what seemed to be an outline of a triangular shaped plane oraircraft but the entire bottom of the plane was lit up.  i also noticed that forbeing so low, it made almost no sound, just a very faint rumbling sound.  i ranback inside and out the front door.  i had to step out onto our sidewalk to seethe aircraft as it went on by and noticed the lights on the back weresequentially flashing and different colors.  i then went back inside.I pretty much figure it was just some kind of military plane but thought id atleast let someone know.Thanks so much.
content.summary: Silent, glowing triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was observing real time images for popoctepetl volcano and noticed a cigarshaped object on the right hand side of the image.  it was in relatively thesame location for a number of images moving slowly to the right i do not knowthe orientation of the camera so can not speculate about north-south etc..  theobject appears in the images from about 2005 - 2009 july 2nd, 2003 gmt localtime as displayed on teh images is gmt -5 hrs. the next opportunity i had toview the abject was 30 minutes later and it was no longer on the screen.The web site for the live camera ishttpwww.Cenapred.Unam.Mxpopouivr.Html.
content.summary: Object by popoctepetl volcano

content.detailedDescription: It was during the summer of 1959 on a working farm now known as dorbrook park. my family lived and my father worked on the farm at the time of the sighting. the physical location of this site is adjacent to the naval weapons station,earle road and rail that runs from the main location in colts neck to belford.At the time of the sighting, my sister, myself, father and mother along withseveral other people were sitting outside enjoying the pleasant summer eveningfrom the front yard of the house that we were living in.  it was at this timethat we all simultaneously noticed what appeared to be a large shiney, silversphere due east of our location.  the sphere was roughly following the directionof the navy road, heading towards the main ammunition storage facility located acouple of miles to the south of our location.  the object was moving in a slowbut deliberate manner at an altitude must have been from 300 to 500 feet.  itsspeed was probably 40 to 50 mph.  the object was also displaying about 10 to 15randomly blinking red and white lights.  the majority of these lights seem toconcentrate rougly around the longitudinal plane of the sphere and appeared tobe separate from the craft itself.  each light seemed to blink at a rate ofmaybe once per second.  it should be noted that the location of this farm now acounty park is within 4 miles of fort monmouth army communications andelectronics command where radar was developed along with a number of otherinitiatives critical to the national defense.  right after our sighting, myfather ran to a phone and attempted to call fort monmouth however, he could notget through at that time.  he did not try again therefore, our sighting was notreported to the best of my knowledge.The sighting lasted only a few minutes as the sphere disappeared behind sometrees however, it can be safely assumed that its path did take it over theammunition depot itself.  of course there have been rumors for years that thefacility was used to store nuclear devices.  in closing, years later i cameacross another witness observed what appears to be the same object however, heviewed it from the navesink river on the river plaza side.  this location isalso on a direct line towards belford sight of the pier where the ammunitionships are loaded and is approximately 4 miles2b- from the farm where we observed the object.
content.summary: Nws earle - daylight sphere - colts neck, nj

content.detailedDescription: 1 - standing on the outside deck at 1219am2 - just seen a strobe pulsating in 2 second intervals3 - well it couldnt have been a plane because it was moving a hell of a lotfaster4 - i couldnt believe how fast the object was travelling5 - i seen the strobe pulse for the first time approx 5 miles away heading in anorthbound direction. im not sure of the altitude. it pulsed approx 4 times 8secondsand then was almost overhead probably 75 degrees. then the pulse headedwestbound for 2 seconds, then southbound for another 8 seconds 4 strobe pulses,then eastbound for 2 seconds. then i lost sight. we have some fighter jetsaround the area after sept 11 there are 2 nuke power plants approx 10 milesnorth of here. but there was no sound from this thing. the flight path frombeginning to end was a long rectangle - but it was instantaneous turning - thatswhat freaked me out. i made a drawing of the flightpath immediately after. thereis no way this thing was a jet aircraft - i am very familiar with how fast theyfly and their engine sounds.6 - object headed eastbound and the mountain blocked the view.
content.summary: Extremely fast vehicle

content.detailedDescription: Me and my 3 cousins cruisin countryside,seen lights,thought they wereheadlights, drove over there.Got closer,iwas on passengerside,looked-up saw theufo above power line pole,car did not stall,got scared drove on, watched it from3 miles.Went home told family members.
content.summary: Saw u.F.O.
Fast comet like object in washington state

content.detailedDescription: Salyersville, kentuckyi addition to my teacing in a middle school i worked as a bookkeeper.One nightas i returned home a i rounded a small curve that tool me into a clearing a thefoot of a hill.Tere was a house sitting on the right side of the road on a bank and two houseson the left side below the road which i was on.It was a nice cool clear nightand i had the driver side windows down in my pickup truck.Suddenly,a blue light began flashing inside the cab of my pickup.My firstthought was that a ky sate police car was flashing my to pull over.I glancedinto my rearview mirror but saw nothing.The lights were still flashing inside mycabs so i looked glanced outside for the source and approximate 30 to my leftand about 25-30 feet over head was an object with blinking blue lights.My my first thought was maybe a balloon.But as quickly as i was it it beganmoving rapidly upward at an approximate 60 degree angle disappeared out ofsight.Its ability to move as rapidly as it did completely rules out a baloon orany thing which the military has.It took my approximate 30 from the time the object began its assent until i gotto the top of the little hill where i could get a view of the horizon.I was itagin bliking and it had moved so far away that now it appeared the size of abright star.Upon my return home my son and his fried who had been out side informed me ofseeing a blinking object in the sky abot 15minutes before i arrived.That wasabout the time i would have observed the object.There was one characteristic of the object which i never thought of untilwatching a ufo program on tv.That was this object made no sound.That was whythen thought of baloon came to me.That objects ability to move silently and its speed defies any thing which wehave on earth.
content.summary: Blinking disc object overhead

content.detailedDescription: i was in my driveway.  i noticed a streaking point of light traveling north to  southeast.  i thought the object might be a satellite or plane, but then it  stopped.  two other lights converged upon it, then, after a split second,  retreated and disappeared. my daughter brought me a pair of binoculars. at 7x  magnification, the object was an oval that glowed red. it the vanished.
content.summary: A streaking light that stopped and was joined by 2

content.detailedDescription: I was in my mothers car.  it was early in the morning, still dark, and she wasinside getting the rest of us kiddos ready to go.  the car was on but the enginewas not running.  i was listening to the radio and watching the stars.  all of asudden a globe colored reddish-orange flew over the roof of the car from theback to the front out over the cotton field.  to me, it was the size of abaseball.  i dont know the altitude of the object.  it appeared to go over thefield at a descending angle and than stop some feet off the ground.  then it wasjust gone.  there was no tail like with a meteor or comet.  for a split second,i thought it was a falling star. then i realized it wasnt and i remember fear. bone chilling fear.  the noise was like a whoosh as it went over head.  myfamily in the house didnt hear it, or at least wont admit to hearing it.  icouldnt move, which could have been the fear.  since this, i have weirdheadaches occasionally. just an uncomfortable feeling, not really a pain, overmy left temple that sometimes shoots to the right.  sometimes its at the base ofmy skull.  id describe it as a feeling of fullness or pressure. on the back ofmy left hand i now have a circular gouge-like scar, about the size of one ofthose old josephs childrens aspirins.I also had an odd in experience in puerto rico while my husband and i werestationed there.  i was being questioned about the name of my god.  there wereother questions but i only remember definately that one.  the entity questioningme was not like the typical alien.  the head was outsized but not grotesquely,the eyes were dark and slanted, but not huge.  the area lighting was dim, likeat a romantic restaurant.  i was not restrained, i was lying down, things seemedgreyish.  i was not in my bedroom.  no fear, just an urgency to answer thequestions.  since the first experience, i have empathic episodes that i try toignore, but they usually turn out to be correct and its hard to ignore that.This may all be nothing, but i feel compelled to tell someone now.  i have alsorecently had this longing to move from texas to new mexico and my head painshave been more constant than usual.  from five to twelve a year to five totwelve a week.
content.summary: A lubbock light in posey, tx

content.detailedDescription: Note i know the latitude, longitude isnt exactly what you were looking for.  idid the best i could with all the tools available to me via the internet.I was 5 yrs old living with my mother and grandmother at 7102 e 55th st, kansascity, mo 64129.  this property is 2 12 acers with two houses on a quite street. however i-435, a major kansas city highway borders it on the east. it was about8 -830pm, and my mother and i were in our nightcloths and were sitting in achair on our portch cuddled up in my blanket looking at the stars.  suddenlywithout any warning or indication a very bright, but not light casting, palewhite light.  there was no noise, no unexprected breaze.  the object was justabove the treeline no more than 500 yrds away.The light stayed there for 15 - 30seconds.  the light then went out and a few seconds reapeared what would havebeen about 50 feet or more to the west left, a deep rich almost crimson red. again the objects light remained lit for 15-30 seconds and then went out.  oncethe light went out the object was not visable.  at no time was i, or my motherfrighten of what was happening i was just courious.  even though i was young iknew what i was seening was not normal.  i never again saw anything like it. although my mother was present, and i almost certinly remember talking with heron how odd the thing we were witnessing was, she does not remember the event atall.  when we went inside i remember that we told my grandmother what we hasseen.  she too does not remember us telling her anything.
content.summary: Large unexplaned light, kansas city, mo

content.detailedDescription: I had come home from the movies, driving home all by myself. and when i lookedto see if my mother had left the lights on i saw these 2 bright white lights inthe sky to the west.They looked like two circles and they were white. they hadthis glow to them and it would fade in and out.But in a slow beat.  and when ipulled home i went inside got my dad and we went back outside and the lightswhere gone but then it looked like there was a helicopter like the direction thelights were headed. so now we went back inside got the binoculers. but we stillcouldnt get a clear view of the copter.Then it stayed in the aircopter for aboutlike 5-10 mins then it went away south in a slow pace.
content.summary: Phoenix az june 27th

content.detailedDescription: I had gone outside to smoke a cigarette and as is my habit, was looking up tosee the stars. this close to dusk the sky was not completely black but rather adeep purplishblack. i saw a large v-shaped object almost directly overhead. theedges of the v had evenly spaced oblong reflector-type lights which only changedin intensity when passing over a ground light source such as a street lamp andthen they seemed to pick up the ground light. i believed it at first to behollow becouse it blended so well with the night sky until it crossed beneathand blocked out a group of stars. then i could see that the body was - for nobetter way to explain it - wavery. i went in to get a digital camera but thecamera would not focusthe lens continued to move in and out as long as i tried to focus it on theobject. as it passed directly overhead, the lower 23rds of both wingtips foldedforwarded and now it looked like a giant w. i held up my hands trying to gaugewidth and distance. im terrible at it but the craft appeared to cover a 12 - 14inch hand spread. it travelled slowly and made no sound and with the exceptionof the reflector-type lights along the edges, it blended perfectly with thenight sky. i couldnt understand why it wasnt falling out of the sky as slow asit was going and with the tips folded forward. i watched it until it passed outof sight.I had a compass on the keyring in my pocket and i tried to take a compassbearing but was unable to due to needle fluctuation until the object had passedout of sight. then i was able to ascertain it was headed predominantly north. icalled the las vegas police department to see if any one else had reportedseeing it and they connected me directly to nellis afb. the man at nellis toldme not to discuss what i saw with anyone. i then told him i was not on drugs nordid i drink nor was i mentally impaired and that i knew what i had seen.Being afairly long term vegas resident, i am familiar with the aircraft that fly out ofnellis and i told him it was not one of the experimental planes they send upsometimes and then he got more terse with me and told me he was advising me onceagain to not speak of this with anyone. period. he asked no questionsshowed neither skepticism or surprise. i told him it was headed directly towardsthe base and i believe he knew exactly what it was i was talking about.I was also surpris
content.summary: Saw v-shaped craft fly over house

content.detailedDescription: Iwas truck driving down i40 in new mexico and saw a reflection in my reviewmirror and grabbed my camera and took a photograph if you guys are interestedcall me i dont think youd be disappointed because i got it on film and i neverhave seen anything like this thank you
content.summary: Triangle shaped with antenna on top

content.detailedDescription: 09i live in aspinwall, on the corner of second  western, just outside the borderof the city of pittsburgh, pa..09last night june 25 2003 i walked to the waterworks mall to get some things atgiant eagle.  i have to go in an easterly direction to get there.  i left thehouse at 1043 p.M. on a trip that normally takes me 12 to 15 minutes.  i got asfar as brilliant ave. and saw a car on second making a very slow turn eitherinto a garage or virginia ave., about a block and a half away from where i was. i couldn92t tell what color it was, because it was night time.  i didn92t think too much of it and continued my walk along second.  by the time i gotacross lexington, another car turned into second from delefield, the next streetup, and drove very slowly, then turned up lexington.  thinking it might be thesame car as before, it kind of raised my suspicions about their motives fordriving so slowly and circling around those few blocks.  this car was red.I was just about to come to a driveway slope in the sidewalk and a low hangingbranch from a fir tree, so i had to be careful about where i was walking and hadto think about where i was going for a few seconds.  i continued to walk, butturned to look at the car.  knowing i was coming up to the driveway slope islowed down for a second as i looked at the car.  out of the corner of my eye isaw a fairly bright light in the sky.  i thought it might92ve been the satellite that can normally be seen from here pretty much everynight.  the stars that i saw in the sky were not much more than pinholes in thefabric of the sky, but this light was about the size of 4 or 5 pinholes lumpedtogether and was dark yellow or light orange, instead of white or very lightblue, like the rest of the stars.It was almost directly above me,but behind me a bit and it seemed as if it wastraveling in the same direction as me, but i92ve noticed before that a93still94 object in the sky like a star will appear to be moving with me as long as iam also moving, but as soon as i stop it93stops94, too.  i wanted to get a better look at this light to see if it was movingand, knowing i was in danger of tumbling on the driveway slope, i turned my headfor a very spilt second, maybe half, or even a quarter of a second, to see wherei ws going, and stopped, and immediately turned back around to look at the lightagain to see if it had stopped moving with me and it was gone.From the distance it seemed to be, through the clearing of the trees above me, iwould h
content.summary: Saw various objects vanish in the sky over the pas

content.detailedDescription: I am relating this event for my father who died some years ago..It occured whilein flight training in florida in the mid 1950s..On  a sunny day 7 jets, with 2pilots each, were in flight training off the florida coast..They apparentlynoticed being tailed by an orange ball..The squad attempted some evasivemanuvers. and then decided at some point, to try and converge on the ball. hesaid it really was useless, that they could never get close, the ball changedflight path, direction and speed, at will, and after toying with the planes,shot off..After landing, there was a debriefing,  within a day or two, there wassome type of meeting with the pilots invoved basically ordering them not tospeak of the incident, and that it had never happened..Im sure some of thoseother pilots are still alive..Unfortunately my father died years ago but spokeof the event..He later was an officer in sac, flew quite a few classifedmissions, and would never have made the story up. thanks, tom waltz
content.summary: related from my father, air force offer chased uf

content.detailedDescription: Just a character note im a manager and a pilot, and was finance officer andpilot for the westover arb civil air patrol squadron.Before going to bed, i had brought my dog downstairs to the backyard to let herdo her thing.While standing in the doorway waiting for her to finish, i felt compelled tolook up into a certain section of the sky which was almost directly above myhead.After only looking at the sky for a few seconds, i saw what appeared to be ameteor going from the south to the north.The distance it covered was approximately the distance of a ruler held at armslength.This did not seem out of the ordinary until about 2 seconds later when anothermeteor-like object or the same one, im not sure followed the exact oppositetrack of the first.That is, where the first started and disappeared, the second appeared and thendisappeared covering the same distance as the first.To this day, i am convinced that this, or these, objects were not meteorsbecause of the extremely high improbability of two meteors mirroring theirtracks and distance in such a short timeframe. it being one meteor is out of thequestion, since a meteor cant go in reverse.Thanks for your time,mike
content.summary: Worlds first reversing meteor, i dont think so.

content.detailedDescription: Paducah, kentuckyfirst a little background about me... i am a trained quality assuranceengineermanager and have a sharp eye for detail.  my vocation demands that i beexact in my portrayal of dimensions, directions, etc...  i also have 3college-level courses in astronomy under my belt, and sure as heck know thedifference between venus, swamp gas, known aircraft, and what i saw.  and what isaw was none of the three aforementioned items....About a month ago, my brother scott called me out on the deck of my house in theback.  he said, there is a ufo out here   i went out as fast as i could, beingas i am disabled and dont move very fast, and looked where he was pointing.Here is what i saw.The object was approximately 12 to 34 as wide as a full moon.  it was definitelycigar-shaped and brilliant white.  it looked just like a fuselage of a jet withabsolutely no wings.  it was traveling from about 030 deg nne on a compass toabout 210 ssw, which is exactly perpendicular to my house as it is oriented. that is why i am so sure of the directional travel of the object  i wouldestimate it was quite a ways up into the sky, about 3 to 5 thousand feet,although it is difficult to say with no other reference points.  the object madeabsolutely no sound.  the skies were clear blue.  it was near 700 p.M.   i firstpicked up the object at an inclination of about 80 degrees azimuth 030 andfollowed it for about 3 minutes until it was at about an inclination of 50degrees azimuth 210.  at that point it flashed brilliant white, so bright i lostsight of the shape of the object.  about five seconds later it flashed a secondtime identical to the first time.  then the object just disappearedi am enclosing a sketch of the object, but it really isnt very detailed as ididnt see much detail other than the shape of the object itself.  the sketchincludes the object shape, the relation of a full moon in size, and the size ofthe 2 bursts of light that the object made, in relation to the size of theobject.
content.summary: Brilliant white cigar shaped object in broad dayli

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony on the 4th of july, i noticed a triangle shapedobject in the eastern sky.I thought it was a jet. it was silver in color and hadround marking on it. then i noticed about 10 or so round black balls trailingthe object. they seemed to be trying to catch up with the object. when theycaught up with the triangle, they made a round circle around the triangle.Thetriangle and the black balls circleing it continued to fly to the north untilthey faded away into the horizon.I was intrested in the black balls as i hadseen just one black ball a couple of years before, which was much closer andlarger and besides changing directions it also hovered, then went straight uptill it was just a pin point then faded away.It was quite a emotional experienceand almost religious feeling.
content.summary: Saw triangle with black balls behind it

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down my driveway toward the mail box.  the weather was mostlycloudy with a strong wind blowing north to south.  the clouds were moving fast. i just happened to look up as the clouds parted and there it was.  i knew theobject was not anything i had ever seen before or since.  i stopped and lookedat it for about three or four seconds.  the object did not move.  it made nosound that i noticed.  then the clouds closed in again concealed the object.  istood watching that spot in the sky for a minute or two until the clouds openedagain but the object was not there any longer.  i looked around the sky for afew minutes but did not see it again.
content.summary: Saw a large spherical object with a band or ridge

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 1110 pm sitting out on back patio having coffee  smoke. patio overlooks nne vegas  flight pattern into mccarran ap. watching planes come in,noticed above, an orange bright light, but, no scrobes or any other light on it.Because of the color  no scrobes watched it travel ne across sky  observed astar ball come out of the object, but it did not fall to the ground. it keptmoving to w, maybe somewhat sw  started to dim, come back bright, dim almostdisappear, come back again, dim and finally go out before my eyes. meanwhile,planes were coming into the reg. pattern just below it. lasted 3 to 4 minutes.Ckd clock when it went out and was 1115 pm. then called mccarran ap  was putthrough to tower, or so they said. also, was put on hold for some time.  nothingwas reported by radar, i was told. he said maybe you saw a ufo jokingly. justwanted to send this in, in case you get any moree-mails on this one. also, did see a satellite earlier moving from n to s.
content.summary: Object observed above landing pattern, mccarran ap

content.detailedDescription: Sulphur springs texas, driving in car with mom due west to evening grocery storedowntown. as approached destination, noticed craft not too much higher than thewater tower or the police communication tower. it seemed to fly toward thecommunication tower and hover and then slowly begin to head east again until itleft our sight. we were excited and in disbelief but really saw a saucer likeobject silently flying within easy visual range. we tried to follow it in itseastern path but it eventually went out of our sight going much faster than wecould on the city street. we first noticed it because it came so low down thatit was almost unavoidable visually. it appeared to approach the policecommunication tower and stop and hover before going back eastward.
content.summary: Metallic saucer-shaped object seen in northeast te
